actionfx-core
  • All Classes
 

Package com.github.actionfx.core.method

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatedParameterResolver<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Interface for resolving a method parameter having an annotation to a value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionFXMethodInvocation
    Convenience class for calling a method that can contain ActionFX annotations (like AFXRequiresUserConfirmation or method argument annotations like AFXControlValue.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter
    Adapter for invoking controller methods with variable method arguments.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter.ParameterValue
    A representation of a method parameter, together with a ParameterHint
    ControlValueAnnotatedParameterResolver
    Implementation of AnnotatedParameterResolver that uses annotation AFXControlValue to resolve the parameter argument by taking the value from the control specified in AFXControlValue.
    FromDirectoryChooserDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "directory chooser" dialog.
    FromFileOpenDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "file open" dialog.
    FromFileSaveDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "file save" dialog.
    FromTextInputDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "text input" dialog.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter.MethodExecutionState
    State that describes whether the method is executed or not, or maybe whether even the execution shall be cancelled.
